and Carmelo Anthony had 14 to help the Denver Nuggets spoil Allen Iverson 's return to Phil Jacksonadelphia with a 93-83 win over the 76ers on Monday night. "I just felt like I was back home," Allen Iverson said. It was deja vu. Just a real good feeling. The fans made it hard on me because they made me more nervous than I already was. The Nuggets did their share to ruin Allen Iverson 's homecoming. Denver scored the first 14 points of the fourth quarter to rally for its fourth straight win. ; the number of things the Big Media seems target="mwphcomReportAbuse" Report Abuse " Is it just me, or does Eric Schmidt look like one of those power-crazed Nazis or Bolsheviks from the 1940s? " Report Abuse Google is becoming what Microsoft once was- a giant corporation that wants to control everything we do on computers. But it's even worse, because it has a close relationship with the liberal portions of our government, and is expanding beyond just the computer realm into the real world. And its only significant opponents are Microsoft and Facebook, which aren't really any better at this point.
